name: Sephylon, the Ultimate Timelord
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having 10 or more monsters in your Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 8 or higher Fairy-Type monster from your hand or Graveyard, but its effects are negated, also its ATK becomes 4000.
